creditline: Gift of the Asian Art Council
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: 3 purple and blue squares with white swirls and dots surrounded by white swirls, dots and stylized Arabic script on a purple ground; squares and flowerlike designs in blue and white; blue and white lines on bands at short ends
markings: \'B/0057\', in blue, on sticker, on back of one corner; \'PAMSP071/1951\', in black, on sticker, on back of same corner
title: Shawl
